full_instructions: On the next screen, you will be presented with instructions for the [b]Color Shapes[/b] activity.
Colored shapes will appear briefly on the screen.
You will be asked to try to remember the shapes and their colors, because they will soon disappear.
Next, you will see the same shapes reappear.
You will be asked to decide whether the shapes have the SAME or DIFFERENT colors as they had before.
